video_prompt: **High-angle POV descends through a rainy, cyberpunk metropolis. Neon reflections ripple across wet streets as futuristic vehicles glide by and pedestrians navigate bustling multi-level walkways. Massive digital billboards flicker with abstract patterns, illuminating towering skyscrapers.**
image_prompt: High-angle, futuristic cyberpunk city at night with towering skyscrapers, bustling street level, and reflective wet surfaces. Dominant electric blues, purples, and reds from glowing building facades, massive digital billboards, and neon lights. Prominent vertical screens displaying abstract patterns and foreign scripts. Intricate, angular architecture with integrated screens, ventilation, and suspended walkways. Densely populated, high-tech, and vibrant atmosphere.
refined_video_prompt: Camera descends through falling rain, causing neon reflections to ripple across wet streets. Futuristic vehicles glide by, while pedestrians flow through bustling multi-level walkways. Massive digital billboards continuously flicker with abstract patterns, casting dynamic light across towering skyscrapers.
